Title: DOOR KICKERS
Genre: Strategy - Real-time - Tactical
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: October 20, 2014
Size: 176.1 MB
Company: KillHouse Games / KillHouse Games
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/door_kickers

About:
Door Kickers is an innovative real-time strategy game that puts you in charge of a SWAT team and lets you command them during a tactical intervention. Analyze the situation, plan team routes, choose equipment, breach points and coordinate multiple troopers to reach the hostage room before the bad guys get to press that trigger.
It may sound daunting, and like real world CQB combat, it sure is. But most levels can be completed in minutes, and on the fly improvisation works. Achieving the perfect plan for getting the mission done with no false steps; that is a skill not easily mastered.
2D, Top Down for optimal tactical analysis
Real time with free pause
No turns, no hexes, no action points or awkward interfaces
Realistic and action packed
Non-linear levels, freeform gameplay
Mission editor and modability
Unlimited gameplay via mission and campaign generators

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Win XP SP3, CPU: Intel Pentium IV 2.6 GHz or equivalent, RAM: 2 GB, Hard Disk Space: 2 GB, Video: An OpenGL 2.0 graphics adapter. NOT SUPPORTED: Intel GMA, Intel HD Graphics (1) or older. Resolution: 1366x768 minimum display resolution
Recommended system requirements - Windows: Win 7, CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+, RAM: 4 GB, Hard Disk Space: 2 GB, Video: NVidia Geforce 9xxx / AMD Radeon HD / IntelHD 3000 series or better, Resolution: 1920x1080, Mouse
